result.execSummary:
The defendant Michael Her was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Manuf/Deliver Amphetamine(<=3g) [Modifiers: Repeater, Second and Subsequent Offense], a class F felony, Wisconsin Statutes 961.41(1)(e)1.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

superMiscConds.notes: GFE to obtain/maintain FTE/FT schooling or combination thereof.
Any assessment, treatment, and counseling as deemed appropriate by PO.

judgments.action: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

charges.dispoDesc: Guilty Due to No Contest Plea

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Michael Her

defendant.name: Her, Michael
defendant.address: 100 Corrections Dr, c/o Stanley Correctional Institution, Stanley, WI 54768

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: DENIED

Clerk Cheree
Case called: 8:50am
State appears by ADA K.Mayo; Defendant by phone from Stanley Correctional Facility/pro se.
(Sentence Adjustment Petition)

COURT notes review of records and information from defendant.
State notes defendant is on reincarceration after ES revocation, and objects to any adjustment.
COURT questions defendant re: reincarceration.

COURT denies petition for Sentence Adjustment.
Defendant states he has not received any treatment while reincarcerated - COURT notes it cannot address any issues with treatment in prison but it appears defendant will be released within a few months and can get in treatment programming at that time.

Adj: 8:54am
Sentence adjustment review on January 30, 2017 at 08:45 am.

records.descr: Notice to D.A./D.A. response on pet. for sent. adj

Clerk Cheree
Cases 13CF712, 13CF750,13CM953,14CF806 called: 1:25pm
State appears by ADA K.Mayo.  Def appears in person/in custody and with Atty Julie Sawyer.  
Plea Quest/Waiver of Rights filed in 14CF806.  

State moves to:
14CF806 - Ct. 1 (Manuf/Deliver Amphetamine/Repeater/2nd+ Offense)>>AMEND to DELETE Repeater enhancer and DELETE 2nd+ Offense enhancer.
COURT GRANTS ABOVE

PLEA: 
14CF806 - Ct. 1 (Manuf/Deliver Amphetamine)>>NO CONTEST

COURT advises def of rights (including constitutional rights) & penalties & ques def to understanding.  

COURT finds plea & waiver of rights freely & vol made, a factual basis & def guilty.

COURT ORDERS:
13CF712 - 2 years TOTAL: 1 year incarceration and 1 year ES w/credit for 62 days of time already served
CONDITIONS OF ES>>Any assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by PO; GFE to obtain/maintain FTE/FT schooling or combination thereof.
13CF750 - 9 months MCJ w/credit for 62 days of time already served
13CM953 - 30 days MCJ w/credit for 30 days of time already served
>>>All sentences to run concurrent to each other
>>>Defendant is eligible for both SAP and CIP in 13CF712
>>>Any unpaid financial obligations are converted to civil judgment.

14CF806>>5 years TOTAL: 2 years incarceration and 3 years ES w/credit for 43 days of time already served
CONDITIONS of ES>>Any assessment/treatment/counseling as deemed appropriate by PO; CC GFE to obtain/maintain FTE/FT schooling or combination thereof; CC.

Adj: 1:40pm
Plea set
Status conference on October 20, 2014 at 10:20 am.
STC set
and Demand for Discovery and Inspection
of Preliminary Examination

Case called: 10:23am. Clerk: Denise.  State appears by ADA Kyle Mayo. Defendant appears in custody and by Atty Julie Sawyer. Waiver of Prelim. filed.  Court questions deft as to waiver. Court finds waiver freely and voluntarily made. COURT finds PC - Defendant bound over for arraignment & trial.  State to file Information this afternoon mirroring the Criminal Complaint. Defense proceeds with Arraignment.  Reading Waived. Plea:  NOT GUILTY. Bond:  Continued. DATES: PTC 10/6/14 @ 10:15am. C: Br. 4. Adj: 10:25am.
Pre-trial conference on October 6, 2014 at 10:15 am.
Preliminary Hearing on September 22, 2014 at 10:10 am.
Pre-trial conference on September 19, 2014 at 10:50 am.
